name: athlete
description: Individual that has achieved celebrity status for their proficiency in sports and other forms of physical exercise.

name: aerospace defense
description: Member of a planetary armed military force operating within a world's atmosphere and close orbit. Also known as the "planetary air force".

name: agent
description: Individual that secretly collects and reports information on the activities, movements and plans of a political or corporate enemy or competitor. Also known as a spy or intelligence operative.

name: barbarian
description: Individual from a primitive world (TL4 or less) capable of surviving on their world without support from a technologically advanced civilization.

name: belter
description: Individual that explores asteroid belts in search of mineral deposits and salvageable material for profit.

name: bureaucrat
description: Official in a government department, charged with following the details of administrative process.

name: colonist
description: Individual that moves to a new world or settles in a new planetary colony.

name: diplomat
description: Individual that is appointed by a planetary or interstellar government to conduct official negotiations and maintain political, economic and social relations with another polity or polities.

name: drifter
description: Individual that continually moves from place to place, without any fixed home or job.

name: entertainer
description: Individual that has achieved celebrity status for their proficiency in publicly entertaining others.

name: hunter
description: Individual that kills or traps large game, almost always large terrestrial mammals, for meat, other animal by-products (such as horn or bone), trophy or sport.

name: marine
description: Member of an interstellar armed military force trained to serve in a variety of environments, often carried on board starships as an adjunct to an interstellar navy. Also known as the "space marines".

name: maritime defense
description: Member of a planetary armed military force operating within and on the surface of a world's oceans. Also known as the "planetary wet navy".

name: mercenary
description: Professional soldier hired to serve in a foreign military force or perform a specific military action.

name: merchant
description: Individual involved in wholesale interstellar trade, particularly between individual worlds or polities.

name: navy
description: Member of an interstellar armed military force that conducts military operations in interplanetary or interstellar space. Also known as the "space navy".

name: noble
description: Member of an elite upper class, having high social or political status.

name: physician
description: Individual that is skilled in the science of medicine and is trained and licensed to treat sick and injured people.

name: pirate
description: Individual that attacks and steals from interplanetary and interstellar ships in space.

name: rogue
description: Individual that makes their living through illicit means.

name: scientist
description: Individual that is engaged in and has expert knowledge of a science, especially a biological or physical science.

name: scout
description: Member of an interplanetary exploratory service, surveying unfamiliar territory in space.

name: surface defense
description: Member of a planetary armed military force operating on the non-hydrographic surface of a world. Also known as the "planetary army".

name: technician
description: Individual that is skilled in mechanical or industrial techniques or in a particular technical field.
